Structs/TrackSegment.html#/s:6GPXKit12Tr.name: distanceInMeters
Structs/TrackSegment.html#/s:6GPXKit12Tr.abstract: Distance in meters to its preceding TrackSegment in a TrackGraph

Structs/TrackPoint.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.name: date
Structs/TrackPoint.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.abstract: Optional date for a given point. This is the date stamp from a gpx file, recorded from a bicycle computer or

Structs/TrackPoint.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.name: power
Structs/TrackPoint.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.abstract: Optional power value for a given point in a gpx file, which got recorded from a bicycle computer through a power

Structs/TrackPoint.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.name: cadence
Structs/TrackPoint.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.abstract: Optional cadence value in revolutions per minute for a given point in a gpx file, which got recorded from a

Structs/TrackPoint.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.name: heartrate
Structs/TrackPoint.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.abstract: Optional heartrate value in beats per minute for a given point in a gpx file, which got recorded from a bicycle

Structs/TrackPoint.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.name: temperature
Structs/TrackPoint.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.abstract: Optional temperature value for a given point in a gpx file, which got recorded from a bicycle computer through a

Structs/TrackPoint.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.name: speed
Structs/TrackPoint.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.abstract: Optional speed value for a given point in a gpx file, which got recorded from a bicycle computer through a speed

Structs/GradeSegment.html#/s:6GPXKit12Gr.name: start
Structs/GradeSegment.html#/s:6GPXKit12Gr.abstract: The start in meters of the segment.

Structs/GradeSegment.html#/s:6GPXKit12Gr.name: end
Structs/GradeSegment.html#/s:6GPXKit12Gr.abstract: The end in meters of the grade segment.

Structs/GradeSegment.html#/s:6GPXKit12Gr.name: elevationAtStart
Structs/GradeSegment.html#/s:6GPXKit12Gr.abstract: The elevation in meters at the start of the segment. Defaults to zero.

Structs/GradeSegment.html#/s:6GPXKit12Gr.name: grade
Structs/GradeSegment.html#/s:6GPXKit12Gr.abstract: The normalized grade in percent in the range -1…1.

Structs/GradeSegment.html#/s:6GPXKit12Gr.name: length
Structs/GradeSegment.html#/s:6GPXKit12Gr.abstract: The length in meters of the segment.

Structs/GradeSegment.html#/s:6GPXKit12Gr.name: elevationGain
Structs/GradeSegment.html#/s:6GPXKit12Gr.abstract: The elevation gain in meters of the segment.

Structs/GeoBounds.html#/s:6GPXKit9GeoBou.name: init(minLatitude:minLongitude:maxLatitude:maxLongitude:)
Structs/GeoBounds.html#/s:6GPXKit9GeoBou.abstract: Initialized a GeoBounds value. You don’t need to construct this value by yourself, as it is done by GXPKits track parsing logic.

Structs/GPXTrack/Segment.html#/s:6GPXKit.name: distance
Structs/GPXTrack/Segment.html#/s:6GPXKit.abstract: The distance in meters of the segment.

Structs/GPXTrack.html#/s:6GPXKit8GPXTrac.name: date
Structs/GPXTrack.html#/s:6GPXKit8GPXTrac.abstract: Optional date stamp of the gpx track

Structs/GPXTrack.html#/s:6GPXKit8GPXTrac.name: graph
Structs/GPXTrack.html#/s:6GPXKit8GPXTrac.abstract: TrackGraph containing elevation gain, overall distance and the height map of a track.

Structs/GPXTrack.html#/s:6GPXKit8GPXTrac.name: segments
Structs/GPXTrack.html#/s:6GPXKit8GPXTrac.abstract: The Segment of the track. Contains at least one segment

Structs/GPXTrack.html#/s:6GPXKit8GPXTrac.name: init(date:waypoints:title:description:trackPoints:keywords:elevationSmoothing:segments:)
Structs/GPXTrack.html#/s:6GPXKit8GPXTrac.abstract: Initializes a GPXTrack. You don’t need to construct this value by yourself, as it is done by GXPKits track parsing logic.

Structs/DistanceHeight.html#/s:6GPXKit14.name: distance
Structs/DistanceHeight.html#/s:6GPXKit14.abstract: Total distance from the tracks start location in meters

Structs/DistanceHeight.html#/s:6GPXKit14.name: elevation
Structs/DistanceHeight.html#/s:6GPXKit14.abstract: Elevation in meters above sea level at that position in the track

Structs/DistanceHeight.html#/s:6GPXKit14.name: init(distance:elevation:)
Structs/DistanceHeight.html#/s:6GPXKit14.abstract: Initializes a DistanceHeight value. You don’t need to construct this value by yourself, as it is done by GPXKits track parsing logic.

Structs/TrackGraph.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.name: segments
Structs/TrackGraph.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.abstract: Array of TrackSegment values. The segments describe a tracks position along with its relative distance to its predecessor.

Structs/TrackGraph.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.name: distance
Structs/TrackGraph.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.abstract: The overall distance of a track in meters.

Structs/TrackGraph.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.name: elevationGain
Structs/TrackGraph.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.abstract: The overall elevation gain of a track in meters.

Structs/TrackGraph.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.name: heightMap
Structs/TrackGraph.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.abstract: A heightmap, which is an array of DistanceHeight values. Each value in the heightMap has the total distance in meters up to that point (imagine it as the values along the x-axis in a 2D-coordinate graph) paired with the elevation in meters above sea level at that point (the y-value in the aforementioned 2D-graph).

Structs/TrackGraph.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.name: gradeSegments
Structs/TrackGraph.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.abstract: Array of GradeSegments. The segments describe the grade over the entire track with specified interval length in meters in initializer.

Structs/TrackGraph.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.name: elevation(at:)
Structs/TrackGraph.html#/s:6GPXKit10Trac.abstract: The elevation at a given distance. Elevations between coordinates will be interpolated from their adjacent track corrdinates.

Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV5sta.name: start
Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV5sta.abstract: The distance in meters from the climbs start to the GPXTracks origin.

Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV3end.name: end
Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV3end.abstract: The distance of the end climb in meters from the GPXTracks origin.

Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV6bot.name: bottom
Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV6bot.abstract: The elevation in meters of the climbs bottom.

Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV3top.name: top
Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV3top.abstract: The elevation in meters of the climbs top.

Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV14to.name: totalElevation
Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV14to.abstract: The total elevation gain in meters of the climb. It may be higher than top - bottom when a climb has flat or descending sections.

Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV5gra.name: grade
Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV5gra.abstract: The average grade (elevation over distance) of the climb in percent in the range {0,1}.

Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV8max.name: maxGrade
Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV8max.abstract: The maximum grade (elevation over distance) of the climb in percent in the range {0,1}. If the climb was constructed from multiple adjacent climbs it has their maximum grade, otherwise maxGrade is equal to grade.

Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV8dis.name: distance
Structs/Climb.html#/s:6GPXKit5ClimbV8dis.abstract: The length in meters of the climb.

Structs/Climb.html.name: Climb
Structs/Climb.html.abstract: Describes a climb section within a track.

Structs/Coordinate.html.name: Coordinate
Structs/Coordinate.html.abstract: Basic type for storing a geo location.

Structs/TrackGraph.html.name: TrackGraph
Structs/TrackGraph.html.abstract: A value describing a graph of a track. Contains metadata such as a GPXTracks distance, elevation and a height-map.

Structs/DistanceHeight.html.name: DistanceHeight
Structs/DistanceHeight.html.abstract: A value describing an entry in a TrackGraphs height-map. It has the total distance in meters up to that point in the track along with the elevation in meters above sea level at that given point in a track (imagine the distance as the value along the x-axis in a 2D-coordinate graph, the elevation as the y-value).

Structs/GPXTrack.html.name: GPXTrack
Structs/GPXTrack.html.abstract: A value describing a track of geo locations. It has the recorded TrackPoints, along with metadata of the track, such as recorded date, title, elevation gain, distance, height-map and bounds.

Structs/GeoBounds.html.name: GeoBounds
Structs/GeoBounds.html.abstract: A 2D-bounding box describing the area enclosing a track.

Structs/GradeSegment.html.name: GradeSegment
Structs/GradeSegment.html.abstract: A value describing a grade of a track. A TrackGraph has an array of GradeSegment from start to its distance

Structs/TrackPoint.html.name: TrackPoint
Structs/TrackPoint.html.abstract: A value describing a single data point in a GPXTrack. A TrackPoint has the latitude, longitude and elevation

Structs/TrackSegment.html.name: TrackSegment
Structs/TrackSegment.html.abstract: Value type describing a logical segment in a TrackGraph. A TrackGraph consists of a collection of TrackSegments. Each has a coordinate (latitude, longitude & elevation) and the distance (in meters) to its preceding segment point.

Structs/Waypoint.html.name: Waypoint
Structs/Waypoint.html.abstract: Value type describing a single Waypoint defined within a GPXTrack. A Waypoint has a location consisting of latitude, longitude and some metadata,

Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.name: distanceVincenty(to:tol:maxIter:ellipsoid:)
Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.abstract: Compute the distance between two points on an ellipsoid.

Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.name: radiusInMeters(latitudeDelta:)
Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.abstract: Calculates the radius in meters around a coordinate for a latitude delta.

Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.name: bounds(distanceInMeters:)
Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.abstract: Calculates the GeoBounds for a GeoCoordinate around a given radius in meters.

Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.name: validLatitudeRange
Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.abstract: A range of valid latitude values (from -90 to 90 degrees)

Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.name: validLongitudeRange
Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.abstract: A range of valid longitude values (from -180 to 180 degrees)

Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.name: distance(to:)
Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.abstract: Calculates the distance in meters to another GeoCoordinate.

Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.name: mercatorProjectionToMeters()
Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.abstract: Performs a mercator projection of a geo coordinate to values in meters along x/y

Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.name: mercatorProjectionToDegrees()
Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.abstract: Performs a mercator projection of a geo coordinate to values in degrees

Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.name: offset(north:east:)
Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.abstract: Helper method for offsetting a GeoCoordinate. Useful in tests or for tweaking a known location

Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.name: bearing(target:)
Protocols/GeoCoordinate.html#/s:6GPXKit1.abstract: Calculates the bearing of the coordinate to a second

Extensions/CLLocationCoordinate2D.html#/.name: init(_:)
Extensions/CLLocationCoordinate2D.html#/.abstract: Convenience initializer for creation of a CLLocationCoordinate2D from a GeoCoordinate

Extensions/RandomAccessCollection.html#/.name: isLap
Extensions/RandomAccessCollection.html#/.abstract: Returns true if the distance between the first and the last is less than 50 meters. Returns false for empty collections.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa6GPXKitAA10Co.name: simplifyRDP(threshold:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa6GPXKitAA10Co.abstract: Helper for simplifying points from a collection if the are closer than a specified threshold.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl6GPXKitA.name: bounds()
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl6GPXKitA.abstract: Creates a bounding box from a collection of GeoCoordinates.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl6GPXKitA.name: path
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl6GPXKitA.abstract: Creates a CGPath form a collection of GeoCoordinates using an MKMPolylineRenderer. Nil if no path could be created.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl6GPXKitA.name: path(normalized:)
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl6GPXKitA.abstract: Creates a path from the collection of GeoCoordinates. Useful if you want to draw a 2D image of a track.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl6GPXKitA.name: removeIf(closerThan:)
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl6GPXKitA.abstract: Helper for removing points from a collection if the are closer than a specified threshold.

Enums/GPXParserError.html#/s:6GPXKit14GP.name: invalidGPX
Enums/GPXParserError.html#/s:6GPXKit14GP.abstract: The provided xml contains no valid GPX.

Enums/GPXParserError.html#/s:6GPXKit14GP.name: parseError(_:_:)
Enums/GPXParserError.html#/s:6GPXKit14GP.abstract: The provided xml could not be parsed. Contains the underlying NSError from the XMLParser along with the xml

Enums/GPXParserError.html#/s:6GPXKit14GP.name: smoothingError
Enums/GPXParserError.html#/s:6GPXKit14GP.abstract: The elevation smoothing failed. See ElevationSmoothing for details.

Enums/ConvergenceError.html.name: ConvergenceError
Enums/ConvergenceError.html.abstract: Error indicating that the distance could not be computed within the maximal number of iterations.

Classes/GPXExporter.html#/s:6GPXKit11GPX.name: xmlString
Classes/GPXExporter.html#/s:6GPXKit11GPX.abstract: The exported GPX xml string. If the track cannot be exported, its value is an empty GPX track xml.

Classes/GPXFileParser.html#/s:6GPXKit13G.name: load(from:)
Classes/GPXFileParser.html#/s:6GPXKit13G.abstract: Helper for loading a gpx track from an url.

Classes/GPXFileParser.html#/s:6GPXKit13G.name: load(from:)
Classes/GPXFileParser.html#/s:6GPXKit13G.abstract: Helper for loading a gpx track from data.

Classes/GPXFileParser.html#/s:6GPXKit13G.name: init(url:)
Classes/GPXFileParser.html#/s:6GPXKit13G.abstract: Convenience initialize for loading a GPX file from an url. Fails if the track cannot be parsed.

Classes/GPXFileParser.html#/s:6GPXKit13G.name: init(data:)
Classes/GPXFileParser.html#/s:6GPXKit13G.abstract: Convenience initialize for loading a GPX file from a data. Returns nil if the track cannot be parsed.

Classes/GPXFileParser.html.name: GPXFileParser
Classes/GPXFileParser.html.abstract: Class for importing a GPX xml to an GPXTrack value.

Classes/GPXExporter.html.name: GPXExporter
Classes/GPXExporter.html.abstract: A class for exporting a GPXTrack to an xml string.

Global%20Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global%20Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
